body:
It would be ideal if temporal provided an implementation of TokenKeyProvider that can be used with providers that support both EC and RSA public signing keys. The current rsaKeyProvider implementation only supports RSA keys.

In addition, not all providers include the optional x5c attribute in the json key returned from `/oauth2/v3/certs` (see https://www.googleapis.com/oauth2/v3/certs).

The build in  TokenKeyProvider should support instantiating keys from the non-optional fields of the json response.
title: provide builtin support for jwtKeyProvider's that use EC public signing keys and do NOT supply x5c attribute
